title: Japan Coastal Escape 90 Minutes from Tokyo with Onsen Baths & Spa
description:
Discover the coastal charm of Japan's Chiba Prefecture with a stay at the Grand Mercure Minamiboso Resort & Spa. This haven provides the perfect base for exploring the region's beaches, colourful flower fields and the historic Nojimazaki Lighthouse. Each stylish room offers views of the Pacific Ocean or the lush greenery of the Boso Peninsula.

Savour local delicacies at Le Sensoriel restaurant, where expert chefs craft exquisite dishes using the freshest regional ingredients. The hotel's sophisticated bar beckons with its carefully curated selection of Japanese whiskies and sake, while the outdoor pool and traditional onsen spa offer tranquil spaces for relaxation and rejuvenation.
offer_address: 1212 Tadara, Tomiuracho, Minamiboso Shi, Chiba 299-2404, Japan
